parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The fogging or discoloration of the double-glazed windows can obstruct the driver's view, making it difficult to see rearview mirrors, approaching traffic, and pedestrians, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Fogging or discoloration between the sandwiched panes of glass
difficulty seeing approaching traffic from left and right at intersections
reduced visibility when backing up or changing lanes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission-related driveshaft seizure can cause the vehicle to roll away after shifting into park, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls away after shifting into park

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle bearing can cause the wheels to lock up, leading to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: the vehicle is difficult to control
the rear axle bearing locks up.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Axle Warpage and Power Steering Gearbox Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The warpage of the front axle and faulty power steering gearbox can cause difficulty in steering, leading to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle is difficult to steer
the power steering gearbox is faulty.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause a range of problems, including loss of power to critical systems, engine stalling, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: leading to problems with starting the engine
